0.Instruction: Rest your elbow on the table.

1.Instruction: Hold the scoop with the handle in your hand.

2.Instruction: Turn the scoop so that your palm faces down towards the table.

3.Instruction: Rotate your hand so that the back of your hand touches the table.

4.Instruction: Repeat the rotation with the scoop once more, going palm down then palm up.

5.Instruction: Take a break until you can begin again.

6.Instruction: Repeat the exercise one more time. I will guide you through the steps.
